> [andreas](#comment_1_16ExhLrK3XmMRhe7XWHJYHdJZa6JnzHr6R): To be honest, I doubt that any decentralized/distributed Internet has any future. Normal, non-technical people don't really care about the things we care about (e.g. hyper security/privacy). Whatever is fastest is the best for them, so in that respect, the Internet wins.

not to say it doesn't have a future, maybe just not a future mainstream.
